wf_workflow_version.description: Workflow to manage NeedIt request approvals
wf_workflow_version.name: NeedIt Approval Workflow
wf_workflow_version.on_cancel: // This script executes if the workflow is cancelled.// The global variable context_sys_id contains the sys_id of the cancelled workflow context.

wf_workflow.description: Workflow to manage NeedIt request approvals
wf_workflow.name: NeedIt Approval Workflow

sys_variable_value.value: // Set 'answer' to the number of seconds this timer should wait answer = 0;
// Set 'answer' to the number of seconds this timer should wait answer = 0;
The Requested For's manager Approved the request
The Requested For's manager Approved the request
The Requested for's Manager rejected the NeedIt request
The Requested for's Manager rejected the NeedIt request

wf_activity.name: Notify NeedIt request for of approvavl

sys_variable_value.value:
Dear ${u_requested_for},
Your NeedIt Request have been approved by Manager.
Your NeedIt Request have been approved
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.
Your NeedIt Request have been approved

Dear ${u_requested_for},
Your NeedIt Request have been approved by Manager.
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.

activity.display_value: Notify NeedIt request for of approvavl

sys_variable_value.value: // Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.

Hello ${u_requested_for},
Your Request have been Rejected by manager.

Hello ${u_requested_for},
Your Request have been Rejected by manager.
